text: Hi John The endpoint and API key needs a json body to load the data with the keys associated with the HubSpot fields. it is not hard, but you do need to MAP the Openforce key:values to the HubSpot contact key:values so the json in the body [{"firstname":"<value of the variable for first name form openforce>"] and add the other fields
Walter- thank you, I appreciate you guiding a newbie. Can all of this mapping be done within a long URL, say at the end?
Can anyone confirm that creating a custom number property as a percentage is still not available to us? it's just internal to HS still...
The numbers property is can be used however you want to use it.
Are you referring to the number tag?
the format type `percentage` isn't available to a custom property. only seems used on a few very specific HS properties.
Where would you be using it?
